file_gdc_id: The GDC assigned id for the file
file_name_key: Google Cloud Storage path to file.
file_name: Name of the datafile stored on the GDC system.
index_file_name: For BAM files, the name of its index file
data_type: Data type stored in Google Cloud Storage, e.g. 'Clinical Supplement', 'Biospecimen Supplement', 'Aligned reads', 'Genotypes', 'Diagnostic image'
data_category: The higher level categorization of the data_type in the file, e.g. 'Biospecimen', 'Clinical', 'Raw sequencing data', 'Simple nucleotide variation'
experimental_strategy: The sequencing, array or other strategy used to generate the data file, e.g. 'RNA-Seq', 'WGS', 'Genotyping array'
data_format: The format of the data file, e.g. 'BAM', 'BCR XML', 'TXT'
analysis_workflow_type: The type of workflow used to generate the data file, e.g. 'BWA-aln', 'STAR 2-Pass', 'BWA with Mark Duplicates and Cocleaning'
endpoint_type: The GDC files API the data file information was gottern from, e.g. 'legacy', 'current'
program_name: The program for which the data was generated, e.g. 'CCLE', 'TARGET','TCGA'.
project_short_name: The id of the project, e.g.  'CCLE-ACC', 'CCLE-UVM', 'TARGET-ALL-P1', ' TARGET-WT', 'TCGA-ACC', 'TCGA-UVM'
sample_gdc_id: The GDC assigned id for the sample
access: An indication of the security protocol necessary to fulfill in order to access the data from the file, e.g. open, controlled.
platform: The sequencing or array platform used, e.g. Illumina HiSeq, Ion Torrent PGM, Affymetrix SNP Array 6.0.
